welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Piliscsaba, Hungary! This charming city is known for its stunning natural beauty and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 2A
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Liszt Ferenc International Airport, serving flights to and from various destinations around the world.

terminals.name: Terminal 2B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Liszt Ferenc International Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights within Europe.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Liszt Ferenc International Airport, currently used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
